title: 無人講？？？HKPORI將會open source 個選舉系統

replies.msg:
https://github.com/hkpori/popvote4-spec
有無it 人解釋下

首先政府有哂全港身份證資料
再加埋open source系統後 政府有機會掌握呢套系統
如果政府有方法拎60萬電子選民堆hash（用國安法？問星島？）
政府有無可能將全港港人身份證輸入系統 得出全港港人係呢個系統下既hash


再將呢堆hash同60萬選民既hash比對，從而identify 呢60萬選民身份同投票意向？

如果得就大撚獲

初選前有邊個拎搜查令掂過啲電腦？點解建制報紙最快有結果？
https://lih.kg/2106906
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區
人地係放個投票系統 唔包個人資料喎
推

密碼學上有一個叫 Kerckhoffs’s Principle，大概係咁：
即使密碼系統嘅任何細節已為人悉知，只要密匙未洩漏，佢都應該係安全嘅。

係真 基本上最出名個堆 MD5 SHA1/2 全部個algorithm 都係出哂街 只要條encryption key冇exposed 啲data都安全

同埋open source 個system唔等於open source data 我賣樓比你上嚟睇樓 唔使訓埋上床比你睇吓我點用張床扑野啊嘛

quote.msg:
key 應該未必有
但encrytion/hashing algo 係會open source?

正路係唔會咁detail話比人知你用咩加密

replies.msg:
Algorithms 公開係冇問題
平時你部電腦同網站之間傳送data用咩方法加密嘅algorithms
一樣好客易會搵得到
但都唔會令到當中嘅數據俾人截到

反而列清楚用咩algorithms 可以俾人驗證到個系統嘅數據係咪安全

解答到我咪唔推lor

Voter ID

The Voter ID is an identifier for each voter that is used to deduplicate votes during the tallying process. Raw Voter ID should not be stored in any persistent storage (even encrypted). A Voter Hash, derived using scrypt, is used instead for deduplication in the tallying processing. A Blinded Voter Hash is used in the ballot signature chain to allow external verification (including servers) without disclosing the Voter ID or the Voter Hash.

Voter ID, Voter Hash, and Blinded Voter Hash are generated using the following steps:

1. To compute the Voter ID, concatenate the last 4 digits of HKID (excluding check digit), date of issue of HKID card (DDMMYY), and day of month from the date of birth (DD).
2. Generate Voter Hash by taking scrypt of Voter ID with the salt popvote_2020_voterid_hash_scrypt.
3. Generate a random 32-byte Voter Hash Secret.
4. Compute the crypto_hash of the concatenation of Voter Hash and Voter Hash Secret. Blinded Voter Hash is the first 32 bytes of the hash.


根據呢兩段Spec

真正同選民資料有直接關係嘅係Voter ID，而佢提到Voter ID，不論未加密定已加密，都唔應該儲存喺任何永久性儲存裝置

而同選民資料有間接關係嘅係Voter Hash，要得到Voter Hash，前提你要有香港市民嘅HKID資料，我當政府可以隨便拎呢啲資料嚟用，然後要攞到初選嗰2日，個系統所使用嘅Salt popvote_2020_voterid_hash_scrypt，佢先可以得到一個不可逆轉+冇任何表面意義嘅Hash

所以簡單啲嚟講
所謂嘅Hash本身就冇儲存低
加上政府要攞到初選嗰陣用嘅Salt
佢先叫做有可能得到有份參選嘅選民嘅Hash
但係Hash本身係冇任何意義，證明唔到一個Hash代表緊咩人

Strong anonymity.
A system is anonymous if neither polling authorities nor anyone else can (1) link any ballot to the voter who cast it, and (2) link two ballots in two polling sessions to the same voter. PopVote 4.0 addressed the first part of anonymity property by separating voter validation and tallier roles. It also uses one-way hashing and procedural controls to prevent the disclosure of voter information. However, we do not address the second part of the anonymity property.

又係唔撚識然後衝出嚟柒
第一，佢EC2 / ECS / EKS 啲機就一定放private subnet,唔會SSH到入去
第二，prod場啲SG 同NACL一定set好晒inbound and outbound rules
第三，mailbox 唔會有AWS account 嘅root password,就算有密碼root account 理論上要開MFA
第四，啲key 就一定放KMS

pinned.msg:
Voter ID

The Voter ID is an identifier for each voter that is used to deduplicate votes during the tallying process. Raw Voter ID should not be stored in any persistent storage (even encrypted). A Voter Hash, derived using scrypt, is used instead for deduplication in the tallying processing. A Blinded Voter Hash is used in the ballot signature chain to allow external verification (including servers) without disclosing the Voter ID or the Voter Hash.

Voter ID, Voter Hash, and Blinded Voter Hash are generated using the following steps:

1. To compute the Voter ID, concatenate the last 4 digits of HKID (excluding check digit), date of issue of HKID card (DDMMYY), and day of month from the date of birth (DD).
2. Generate Voter Hash by taking scrypt of Voter ID with the salt popvote_2020_voterid_hash_scrypt.
3. Generate a random 32-byte Voter Hash Secret.
4. Compute the crypto_hash of the concatenation of Voter Hash and Voter Hash Secret. Blinded Voter Hash is the first 32 bytes of the hash.


根據呢兩段Spec

真正同選民資料有直接關係嘅係Voter ID，而佢提到Voter ID，不論未加密定已加密，都唔應該儲存喺任何永久性儲存裝置

而同選民資料有間接關係嘅係Voter Hash，要得到Voter Hash，前提你要有香港市民嘅HKID資料，我當政府可以隨便拎呢啲資料嚟用，然後要攞到初選嗰2日，個系統所使用嘅Salt popvote_2020_voterid_hash_scrypt，佢先可以得到一個不可逆轉+冇任何表面意義嘅Hash

所以簡單啲嚟講
所謂嘅Hash本身就冇儲存低
加上政府要攞到初選嗰陣用嘅Salt
佢先叫做有可能得到有份參選嘅選民嘅Hash
但係Hash本身係冇任何意義，證明唔到一個Hash代表緊咩人
